Homeless family camps for months at Whangārei beach, draws complaints https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/homeless-family-camps-for-months-months-at-at-whangarei-bacharei-beach-draws-complaints/qskyhc3z75efjpcoifs6hj2lom/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/homeless-family-camps-for-months-months-at-at-whangarei-bacharei-beach-draws-complaints/qskyhc3z75efjpcoifs6hj2lom/ Sarah CurtisHomeless family caused controversy after freedom camping for nearly three months. Tue, 18 Feb 2025 17:00:00 +0000 Picturesque Parua Bay, on the Whangarei Harbour, has space for about 15 tents; visitors are allowed to stay for up to three nights. However, for three months this summer the whole of the tent area was taken up by a large group of homeless campers, exempt from the rules. Photo / Mike Howe, Rankers
